review: What a great product.  Bought the 1st one and the wife and I loved it so much, we bought a 2nd for the upstairs TV!  You can stream almost anything to you TV now.  Even your desktop screen!  With the cast the entire screen/window (in experimental mode, but works great), you can even cast your entire desktop/laptop screen to the TV through the chrome browser.  So you don't need to install Plex Media Player anymore.  Just play whatever media you want, and the cast the entire screen to the TV and the TV will pick up both video and audio from the desktop!Great job google!  You heard our cries and have answered.
author: Tim T.
